title: Refund of Bard Purchase
body:
So I was unimpressed with Bard and I looked in the shop to see if I could refund the bundle I bought, unfortunately it told me that I was unable to refund the purchase of my Bard Bundle, so I checked the FAQ. This is what I got;


Bundles
We now have flexible cost bundles that automatically adjust their price based on the content you already own. Bundles have a minimum cost, but pricing is otherwise flexible. Although we are able to refund Champion Release Bundles, we will not refund larger bundles with flexible cost.

From what I understand the bundle I bought was a Champion Release bundle, yet I'm not able to refund it? Is there something I am doing wrong, or was it not considered a champion release bundle?

replies.body:
It's entirely possible that they just didn't label it right in coded language. You should make a support ticket about this.

You still have at least one refund left, right?

Yeah, I've got three refunds left, I'm not sure how to open a support ticket, do I do it in game or via e-mail / forum, etc?

Edit: Never mind, found it on the left side bar. :)
Righteo. Do you have the transaction code for the purchase? They shouldn't have to ask for it, but it's good to have just in case.
